attributes.action: Invest in medical research that does not involve animal tesing/vivisection
attributes.additional_details: 94% of drugs that have been "successfully" tested on animals fail at clinical trials.  Vivisection is cruel and should be replaced by non-animal alternative testing. Currently the government spends a tiny fraction on non-animal medical research in comparison to vivisection.    I would like the government to invest the money that is currently spent on vivisection on medical research programmes that do not involve animals.
